S0266: Era un viejo amigo de mi padre.
He was an old friend of my father.
S0267: Have you heard from your friend?
S0268: Sí, me envió dos correos electrónicos la semana pasada.
Yes she sent me two emails last week.
S0269: ¿Por qué no quieres esperar a tu padre?
Why don't you want to wait for your father?
S0270: Porque estoy preocupado de que voy a llegar tarde.
Because I'm worried that I'm going to be late.
S0271: ¿Te gustaría venir con nosotros el próximo mes?
Would you like to come with us next month?
S0272: Sí eso suena como una gran idea.
Yes that sounds like a great idea.
S0273: No unfortunately I've got too much work.
S0274: ¿Tienes que salir en unos pocos días?
Do you have to leave in a few days?

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
